text: I think I figured out Rust a bit... So 90% of the pain with rust is in choosing data structures and abstractions. But once you move past that its actually really easy and fun to write.

elements.text: I think I figured out Rust a bit... So 90% of the pain with rust is in choosing data structures and abstractions. But once you move past that its actually really easy and fun to write.

text:
I find dealing with the error types to be a bit of a pain, too.

Maybe that's just me being a bad programmer, but it definitely slows down prototyping, which in turn reduces my motivation to keep writing rust.
